description:
If you need Excel skills to get a job – but you’ve never used Excel before, this course will get you up to quickly Learn Microsoft Excel.  Anybody can do it in three hours or less.

Just about some years back I was struggling with learning MS Excel myself. I could not even build simple Pivot Tables, lookup formulas, leave aside any analysis. After a lot of regular practice and hard work I now am an expert user.

I am now sharing this Excel Tutorial for Beginners that will make sure you do not have to go through all that hard work and pain.

Give it a try and let me know if this training helps you get a better job or a promotion.
title: Mastering MS Excel®  (Beginners/Intermediate)
